meta.workflow_packages.blank.label: Blank Deck
meta.workflow_packages.iterative_loop.de: Cycle AI planning, tool work, and feedback till there be no tool calls.
meta.workflow_packages.single_pass.label: Single Pass
meta.workflow_packages.single_pass.descr: Run one AI request and tool run, no loop.
meta.workflow_packages.plan_execute_summ: Plan with the model, run tools, then ask for a final recap.
Run lint, unit, then UI tests with conditional gating.
meta.workflow_packages.repo_scan_context: Map-reduce repo files into context before the AI request.
meta.workflow_packages.contextual_iterat: Scan files, then loop AI/tool steps till no tool calls remain.
meta.workflow_packages.game_tick_loop.de: Seed a tick script and loop AI/tool steps fer a few cycles.
